They were stunt doubles, lol Just hit up Google ;) 

via.. TheSun dot co dot uk 
"The Queenâs stunt double revealed as wingsuit daredevil " 

Gary Connery, dressed in an identical salmon outfit to Her Majesty, jumped from a helicopter above the stadium, alongside fellow parachutist Mark Sutton togged up as James Bond actor Daniel Craig.
There was never a question in my mind if the queen really jumped or not. Still, I have to say good show. The whole little bit really caught me by surprise.
I kept hoping the Queen's parachute wouldn't open  :)
I can always rely on TPB to show me what I can't find anywhere else!
